Hey, Barry, you old perv!  Oops, I mean, old sword master.  Hahahaha!
 Yeah, Yumoto's text is where I likely got the idea, thought I'd
embellish with all the various English spellings that yield similar
pronunciations.  I have a question re the use of "ae" as in
"koshirae".  Should this be pronounced "koh-shee-rah-eh"? I swear I
hear people say something like "koh-shee-ray", but I never saw a
unique pronunciation for the "ae" conjunction such as there is for the
"ai" and "ei" combinations.  Let me know what you think, Barry, as
soon as you sober up enough to focus on the keyboard (try to ignore
that splitting headache from overimbibing that crappy Oz wine).
HAHAHAHAHAHA!!!

NC  ;o)
